97 class ExcInvalidWindow : public cinder::Exception {
98  virtual const char * what() const throw() { return "Invalid Window"; }
99 };
100 
102 struct FullScreenOptions {
103  FullScreenOptions() : mKioskMode( true ), mSecondaryDisplayBlanking( false ), mExclusive( false )
104  {}
105 
107  FullScreenOptions& kioskMode( bool enable = true ) { mKioskMode = enable; return *this; }
109  FullScreenOptions& secondaryDisplayBlanking( bool enable = true ) { mSecondaryDisplayBlanking = enable; return *this; }
111  FullScreenOptions& exclusive( bool enable = true ) { mExclusive = enable; return *this; }
113  FullScreenOptions& display( DisplayRef display ) { mDisplay = display; return *this; }
114 
116  DisplayRef getDisplay() const { return mDisplay; }
118  bool isKioskModeEnabled() const { return mKioskMode; }
120  bool isSecondaryDisplayBlankingEnabled() const { return mSecondaryDisplayBlanking; }
122  bool isExclusive() const { return mExclusive; }
123 
124  private:
125  DisplayRef mDisplay;
126  bool mKioskMode, mSecondaryDisplayBlanking, mExclusive;
127 };

129 class Window : public std::enable_shared_from_this<Window> {
130  public:
131  // Parameters for a Window, which are used to create the physical window by the App
132  struct Format {
133  Format( RendererRef renderer = RendererRef(), DisplayRef display = Display::getMainDisplay(), bool fullScreen = false, Vec2i size = Vec2i( 640, 480 ), Vec2i pos = Vec2i::zero() )
134  : mRenderer( renderer ), mFullScreen( fullScreen ), mDisplay( display ), mSize( size ), mPos( pos ), mPosSpecified( false ),
135  mResizable( true ), mBorderless( false ), mAlwaysOnTop( false ), mFullScreenButtonEnabled( false ),
136  mTitleSpecified( false ), mTitle( "" )
137 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA_TOUCH )
138  , mRootViewController( NULL )
139 #endif
140  {
141  mFullScreenOptions.kioskMode( true );
142  }
143 
145  DisplayRef getDisplay() const { return mDisplay; }
147  void setDisplay( DisplayRef display ) { mDisplay = display; }
149  Format& display( DisplayRef displayRef ) { mDisplay = displayRef; return *this; }
151  bool isFullScreen() const { return mFullScreen; }
153  const FullScreenOptions& getFullScreenOptions() const { return mFullScreenOptions; }
155  void setFullScreen( bool fullScreen = true, const FullScreenOptions &options = FullScreenOptions() ) { mFullScreen = fullScreen; mFullScreenOptions = options; }
157  Format& fullScreen( bool fs = true ) { mFullScreen = fs; return *this; }
159  Vec2i getSize() const { return mSize; }
161  void setSize( const Vec2i &size ) { mSize = size; }

165  Format& size( const Vec2i &s ) { mSize = s; return *this; }

176  Format& pos( const Vec2i &pos ) { mPos = pos; mPosSpecified = true; return *this; }

287  Vec2f toPixels( Vec2f s ) const { return s * getContentScale(); }

291  Area toPixels( const Area &a ) const { const float s = getContentScale(); return Area( (int32_t)(a.x1 * s), (int32_t)(a.y1 * s), (int32_t)(a.x2 * s), (int32_t)(a.y2 * s) ); }
293  Rectf toPixels( const Rectf &a ) const { return a * getContentScale(); }
295  float toPoints( float s ) const { return s / getContentScale(); }

299  Vec2i toPoints( Vec2i s ) const { return Vec2i( (int32_t)(s.x / getContentScale()), (int32_t)(s.y / getContentScale()) ); }
301  Area toPoints( const Area &a ) const { const float s = 1.0f / getContentScale(); return Area( (int32_t)(a.x1 * s), (int32_t)(a.y1 * s), (int32_t)(a.x2 * s), (int32_t)(a.y2 * s) ); }
303  Rectf toPoints( const Rectf &a ) const { return a / getContentScale(); }

443  bool isValid() const { return ! mValid; }
444  void setInvalid() { mValid = false; }
445 
447  // This should not be called except by App implementations
448 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA ) && defined( __OBJC__ )
449  static WindowRef privateCreate__( id<WindowImplCocoa> impl, App *app )
450 #elif defined( CINDER_MSW )
451  static WindowRef privateCreate__( WindowImplMsw *impl, App *app )
452 #else
453  static WindowRef privateCreate__( WindowImplCocoa *impl, App *app )
454 #endif
455  {
456  WindowRef result( new Window );
457  result->setImpl( impl );
458  result->setApp( app );
459 
460  return result;
461  }
463 
464  App* getApp() const { return mApp; }
465 
466  protected:
467  Window() : mValid( true ), mImpl( 0 ) {}
468 
469  void testValid() const {
470  if( ! mValid )
471  throw ExcInvalidWindow();
472  }
473

476 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA )
